    • run

      public void run()
      Starts listening to clients. The first client connected will choose the number of players. Until player numbers is reached, the game starts.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • initGameConnections

      public void initGameConnections()
      Listens to connections from 2 or 3 clients Any gamer object will be created with - A reference to its socket - A name - A progress id (created from i)
